titles.title: Preventing Civilian Casualties in Military Operations Act of 2017
A bill to require reports on civilian casualties in connection with United States military operations.
Preventing Civilian Casualties in Military Operations Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Preventing Civilian Casualties in Military Operations Act of 2017
This bill directs the Department of Defense to report annually to the congressional defense committees on civilian casualties caused as a result of U. S. military operations during the preceding year.
